# Please edit this for your environment

path=/var/www/html/sugar65/demo/custom/modules/Asterisk

### finish to edit :-)

start() {
        KIND="asterisklogger"
        echo -n "Starting $KIND services: "
        cd $path
        php asteriskLogger.php >> /var/log/asterisklogger&
        echo -n " done "
        echo

}
stop() {
        KIND="asterisklogger"
        echo -n $"Shutting down $KIND services: "
        killall php
        echo -n " done "
        echo

}
restart() {
        stop
        start

}
case "$1" in
  start)
        start
        ;;
  stop)
        stop
        ;;
  restart)
        restart
        ;;
 *)
        echo $"Usage: $0 {start|stop|restart}"
        exit 2
esac

exit $?
